Hello World!

.. _example:

::

    def __init__(self, function, fmt = DEFAULT_FMT):
        self.function = function
        self.fmt = fmt

------------

Subsection b of Section 1

- one
- two
- three

Enumerated list:

1. one
2. two
#. auto-enumerated

Definition list:

one
      one is a number.
two
      two is an another number.
